tests.name: Data Pipeline
tests.description: Load universe -> fetch data -> cache -> return DataFrame
tests.notes: [OK] Loaded 5 symbols, fetched 21 bars for TSLA

tests.name: Scanner Pipeline
tests.description: Load strategy -> scan universe -> generate signals -> filter by quality gates
tests.notes: [OK] Scanned 62 bars for AAPL, generated 0 signals

tests.name: Backtest Pipeline
tests.description: Load data -> run backtest -> generate equity curve -> calculate metrics
tests.notes: [OK] Backtest engine created, scanner loaded, 126 bars ready

tests.name: Execution Pipeline
tests.description: Signal -> policy gate -> position sizing -> broker submission -> idempotency check
tests.notes: [OK] Policy gate passed, sized 133 shares ($19950.00), idempotency verified

tests.name: Risk Pipeline
tests.description: Check kill switch -> check kill zone -> check exposure limits -> approve/reject
tests.notes: [OK] Kill switch: inactive, Kill zone: Lunch Chop (11:30-14:30): Low volume, avoid new entries, Policy: ok

tests.name: Recovery Pipeline
tests.description: Crash simulation -> state restore -> position reconciliation
tests.notes: [OK] State recovered successfully after crash, idempotency preserved
